text: @realDonaldTrump Now you are targeting your petty vindictive infantile comments at Governor Cuomo who is outshining you &your incompetent‘Coronavirus Team’! You hate it when your incompetence is there for all to see... .so you attack the ‘good guy’ but America is now aware of your tired tactics!
